name: KOWA-OTO
description:
Hear the dry cackling sounds surrounding you in the dark…
Can you escape from the dungeon to see the light of day again?
It challenges your hearing!

KOWA-OTO is a sound horror game that incorporates stereophonic sound technology for a surround sound effect to engulf players. Feel the realism of the game using your headphones.

NOTE: This game requires headphones or earbuds.

※iPhone 3GS or iPhone 4 OS 4 highly recommended
